title: Sick, Sad World
description: Stories of the strange, sick, and macabre. Includes the features G-String Grandmas, De-classified Government Polaroids, Neo-Natal Skinheads, Homicidal House Plants, Orca in the Court, The Immaculate Confection, and more!
quote: Can monkeys surf the net and corrupt our kids? Chimpanzee chatrooms next on Sick, Sad World.
altHero: a man double fists carrots at a table covered in carrots and a tree grows out the top of his head
alt1: a baby dressed in goth gear: black diaper with safety pins, studded wristbands, heavy boots, and a black pacifier
alt2: two frogs in king and queen attire on a science lab table
alt3: a bust of a human head made of instestines
alt4: a killer whale testifies in court
